name: Fasty Change
description:
Fasty Change is a game all about change. You will be playing as a hungry number and can only eat numbers which are smaller. However, after each eating, you'll change into a new number which can be big or small. So, you'll have to constantly adapt to your "new self".

Don't be afraid to be weak;
Don't be too proud to be strong;
Because you don't know what you will be in the next second, weak or strong...
